scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.test:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm run test"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.deploy: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.deploy-cluster: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run cluster"
